channel.title: CVE Feed for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- ESET NOD32 Antivirus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- ESET NOD32 Antivirus

item.title: CVE-2023-3160|2024-10-09T20:04:15.607Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20nod32%20antivirus
item.description: The vulnerability potentially allows an attacker to misuse ESET’s file operations during the module update to delete or move files without having proper permissions.

item.title: CVE-2024-7400|2024-09-27T18:54:39.099Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20nod32%20antivirus
item.description: The vulnerability potentially allowed an attacker to misuse ESET’s file operations during the removal of a detected file on the Windows operating system to delete files without having proper permissions to do so.

item.title: CVE-2024-2003|2024-06-21T14:18:48.023Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20nod32%20antivirus
item.description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability allowed an attacker to misuse ESET's file operations during a restore operation from quarantine.

item.title: CVE-2024-2003|2024-06-21T07:20:03.749Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20nod32%20antivirus
item.description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability allowed an attacker to misuse ESET's file operations during a restore operation from quarantine.

item.description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability allowed an attacker to misuse ESET's file operations during a restore operation from quarantine.

item.description: The vulnerability potentially allowed an attacker to misuse ESET’s file operations during the removal of a detected file on the Windows operating system to delete files without having proper permissions to do so.
